bio: A podcast and newsletter segment covering Optimism ecosystem news.
contributionDescription: ETH Daily provided over 100 OP News updates to an audience of 2,200 podcast listeners and 230 newsletter subscribers. In the fast-changing Optimism Collective, ETH Daily plays a crucial role in keeping users well-informed. OP News is a series of Optimism-related updates featured in over 100 episodes in a segment called Optimism Highlights.
impactDescription:
ETH Daily boosts the Optimism Collective's brand awareness, reaching over 2,200 crypto enthusiasts. ETH Daily provides essential OP News coverage, keeping end-users, developers, journalists, and crypto security firms informed about network upgrades and new OP Stack chains. bio: Sum Pictures integrates blockchain technology into the production process.
contributionDescription:
Sum Pictures is a Production Company… built on the Optimism network.

We are dedicated to crafting tailored solutions for today's content creators. Our driving force is the seamless integration of blockchain technology into the production process, empowering content creators and elevating the storytelling quality.

We believe in audience involvement in the filmmaking journey. Through interactive production dynamics, we invite our community to co-create films, ensuring impactful cinematic experiences.

Our ecosystem combines innovative financing, audience insights, pre-screening mechanisms, and strategic distribution. This convergence fuels collaboration between content creators and audiences, ushering in a new entertainment era marked by the potential of blockchain integration.

In the present landscape,

Therefore, problems exist because we do. It is key to stay optimistic even when you have no worries in the world because it allows you to be hopeful for the future rather than dwell on the past. Optimism is necessary in everyday life because it allows us to learn from our failures

bio: Jessy’s Hacker House supports a strong community of builders
contributionDescription: Jessy's hacker house is a beacon for engineers and innovators in the Ethereum ecosystem, offering a supportive community to navigate this niche industry. We prioritize our residents, fostering an environment where they can collaborate, learn, and form lasting bonds. Our rigorous selection process ensures we house genuine, curious, and resourceful individuals. We view our houses as a public good, never compromising our values for monetary gain. Living and hacking together fosters deeper connections than casual meetups. We value obsession, genuine curiosity, and resourcefulness. We will include a list of all projects built by our residents.

contributionLinks.description: Ring buffer in solidity (Made for optimism)
Many more projects can be found linked here in our twitter

impactDescription: Jessy's hacker house and the Optimism Collective share a profound synergy in their commitment to Ethereum's sustainable future. While the Collective envisions a world where public goods equate to profitability, Jessy's house actualizes this by nurturing open-source projects. The single requirement for residents of Jessy's hacker house, is that whatever they build, it must be free open source. The house's emphasis on free open-source software resonates with the Collective's retroactive public goods funding, underscoring the belief that true value lies in communal benefits. We challenge traditional notions of profit, advocating for a model where community-driven initiatives and shared benefits define success in the Ethereum landscape.

contributionDescription: Get paid to build the future of finance. Uniswap Governance offers grant funding for people building apps, tools, and activities on the Uniswap Protocol , This program is meant to be the simplest possible MVP of a Uniswap Ecosystem Grants initiative. While the multi-sig committee comes with trust assumptions about the members, our hope is the community will approve this limited engagement to get the ball rolling in an efficient structure.
impactDescription: The mission of the UGP is to provide valuable resources to help grow the Uniswap ecosystem. Through public discourse and inbound applications, the community will get first-hand exposure to identify and respond to the most pressing needs of the ecosystem, as well as the ability to support innovative projects expanding the capabilities of Uniswap. By rewarding talent early with developer incentives, bounties, and infrastructure support, UGP acts as a catalyst for growth and helps to maintain Uniswap as a nexus for DeFi on Ethereum.

bio: The fastest one-stop gas station for exploring L2's and upcoming testnets.
contributionDescription:
Gas.Zip is a multi-chain bridge that currently supports 40+ mainnets and testnets via Optimism, Arbitrum and Ethereum. The team launched Gas.Zip in June. Since then, there has been very steady user growth, transaction volume.

We built Gas.Zip to make chain exploration easy. It is difficult for the majority of users and builders to explore new chains, ecosystems easily and quickly. Infrastructure like Gas.Zip solves this problem.
impactDescription:
- Deployed a novel product that solves a clear problem; encourages builders and explorers to use Optimism.
- Product has accrued steady (quantifiable and monitored) user growth and traction over the last quarter since launch (unique users, transaction count etc).
- Team behind product continues to develop and ship improvements, solicit reguarl user feedback.

contributionDescription:
open to all Optimism artists, creators".  So well i guess my contribution might be more on a symbolic level, but in the beginning of 2023 when i thought a lot about which L2 to use i went for Optimism because at that time there was mainly the choice between Arbitrum, Optimism and the sort-of L2 Polygon PoS. Arbitrum seemed very DeFi focused, Optimism had at least a NFT marketplace even though with obviously little real use.
And there is this NFT tool platform decent.xyz which supported Optimism. At that time more or less the only platform. It felt a bit lonely at that time with Optimism music NFTs, not many others existed.  Mint success was negligible, but well still fun.
Because it ofc is also somehow exciting to be an early user of something.

impactDescription:
As said idk if there is any impact. Measurable that is. But after the open-up and Optimism support i also deployed music NFTs with sound.xyz and manifold.xyz.
So why apply here?  I'm one of the users and creators of the Optimism blockchain. Many Dapps often lack users.  Many wallets tbh have still poor Optimism support.
I would want more users to apply, because they are in the end what the Optimism blockchain exists for.  And if there is a symbolic grant or not, isn't even the point.
It's nice that Optimism helped to save gas fees otherwise there wouldn't be any reason to use it, i think this is obvious.

contributionDescription: The OP token gives holders participation rights in The Optimism Collective, a two-tier governance system composed of Token House and Citizens’ House. Citizens’ House will come live later in 2022. Token House, which is already active, governs technical decisions related to Optimism, such as software upgrades. The Citizens’ House governs public-goods funding decisions. In its early days, Optimism itself raised funds on Gitcoin, a major public-goods funding platform.

bio: Cryptodevs are the largest Crypto dev community
contributionDescription:
Cryptodevs are the largest Crypto developer community in the space. We are completely free, with a pure volunteer team, and aim to bring developers up to standard for Ethereum, Optimism as well as all other networks as a completely network agnostic and neutral space. We help new devs with any support they need, provide connections to careers through partners, help to give developers a platform to grow and build the next gen of dApps and core protocols.

Cryptodevs is a community that's 13k developers strong. We have helped developers go from unknowns to core developers at protocols such as Polygon, Opensea, Prysm and more through support, networking and a general environment to build in a no shill, completely free and open space.
impactDescription:
We have helped developers from every ecosystem to have their contracts reviewed, helped with support to build tools, design systems, network, get careers and grow their projects. We are a general developer community to support new devs in the space. We currently have 14k developers, 1k visitors a week to the Discord as well as 15k users on the subreddit.

We have constantly maintained channels for support specifically with Solidity. We aim to run more events and hackathons to be able to further increase awareness for projects, onboard more devs into the space and help build more tools for users.

contributionDescription:
Developing the Optimism Virtual Machine (OVM): The OVM is a new type of virtual machine that is specifically designed for running Optimistic Rollups. I helped to design and implement the OVM, which is a key component of the Optimism network.
Contributing to the Optimism Sequencer: The Optimism Sequencer is a piece of software that coordinates the execution of transactions on the Optimism network. I helped to develop and improve the Optimism Sequencer, which is essential for the smooth operation of the network.
impactDescription:
My work on the OVM has helped to make it a reliable and efficient platform for running Ethereum smart contracts. The OVM is now used by a wide range of projects, including some of the largest and most popular decentralized applications on Ethereum.

My work on the Optimism Sequencer has helped to improve the performance and scalability of the Optimism network. The Optimism Sequencer is now able to process thousands of transactions per second, making Optimism one of the fastest and most scalable Layer 2 scaling solutions for Ethereum.

contributionDescription:
OP is the native governance token of Optimism, a Layer-2 network built to address Ethereum’s scalability challenges.
Optimism utilises a technology called optimistic rollups to bundle transactions and reduce fees on the Ethereum network.
OP token holders can participate in the governance of Optimism through the Optimism Collective.
Users can acquire OP tokens through exchanges, trading platforms, airdrops, or by participating in Optimism’s ecosystem.

bio: A DeFi enthusiast obsessed with layer 2 and Ethereum development
contributionDescription:
I've played a significant role in educating the blockchain community through informative threads about the OP Stack narrative. These threads focus on Optimistic Rollups, a key element of the OP Stack, and its implications for the broader Optimism ecosystem.

The OP Stack is a critical advancement in Ethereum scalability, and my threads have made it easier for both newcomers and experienced enthusiasts to understand its significance. I've provided insights into the potential benefits and challenges of these innovations, aiming to bridge the knowledge gap.

In summary, my goal has been to inform and prepare readers for the evolving landscape of blockchain technology, fostering anticipation and confidence in the Optimism ecosystem.
impactDescription: In my content, I've informed my audience about the Op Collective and its essential role in the Optimism ecosystem. This collective actively promotes innovation and development on Optimism, collaborating with projects and initiatives that align with Optimism's goals. Their work not only benefits Optimism but also has the potential to impact the broader blockchain community.

bio: Harness the power of blockchain to create an equitable future for all.
contributionDescription:
The Optimism Collective's commitment to transparency and collaboration stood out. As my involvement deepened I transitioned from passive to active participation, collaborating on real-world blockchain solutions. Through the collective, I learned that blockchain's true power lies in its communities.

With RetroPGF, I could add or create a better cohort with talents in onboarding and educating new or seasoned users to better understand and leverage on-chain application.
impactDescription:
Goals and Objectives:
1. Simplify Onboarding.
2. Increase User Adoption.
3. Community Engagement.
4. Educational Resources.

Challenges Faced:
Integrating Optimism's Layer 2 solution with Perpetual Protocol presented technical challenges that required extensive collaboration with developers. Educating users about Layer 2 technology and the advantages of using Optimism required a concerted effort through clear and accessible resources.

Scaling Impact: Our success will serve as a model for fostering user adoption and onboarding across other blockchain projects, ultimately contributing to the growth of the entire blockchain ecosystem.

contributionLinks.description: Tusima zkBridge Testnet Is LIVE NOW!

impactDescription: Utilizing ZK technology, Tusima zkBridge securely transmits the source chain’s status to the destination chain. Users can directly access the source chain certificate on the destination chain and independently verify it, thereby enhancing security. Throughout the entire proof process of Tusima zkBridge — starting from ‘Chain A → Sender → zkRelayer → ZK Verifier → Receiver → Chain B’ — verification of information transfer relies solely on mathematical and cryptographic formulas. Once the code is successfully deployed, no external forces can affect or interfere with this cross-chain process.

bio: The Graph organizes and makes usable web3 data for dapps via GraphQL.
contributionDescription:
The Graph has supported Optimism since the initial launch of mainnet. More on that here: https://thegraph.com/blog/graph-optimistic-ethereum/. 

Since Optimism mainnet launch, The Graph's hosted service, subsidized by The Graph ecosystem (meaning completely free for dapps) has served:

22.7B queries
1.15K subgraphs
with a 99.97% query success rate.

Over the past 30 days alone, The Graph has served 1.24B queries.
Also, The Graph supports Optimism Goerli and Kovan, and on testnet has served:

Goerli
1.24B queries
272 subgraphs
99.98% query success

Kovan
173M queries
154 subraphs
99.99% query success

bio: I am a photographer and minimalist
contributionDescription:
As a photographer focused on documenting technological progress, I'm thrilled to share images that help tell Optimism's story. Through my lens, I strive to capture the collaborative spirit and groundbreaking work happening here.

Some of my favorite shots show programmers deep in thoughtful discussion, refining ideas that could revolutionize how we build for the future. Whiteboards fill with diagrams as concepts become code, step by step, line by line. I also love capturing the "aha!" moments – when pushing past tough problems leads to breakthroughs. Those victorious smiles say so much about the dedication in overcoming challenges.
impactDescription:
I've had the privilege of visually documenting their important work over the past year. While the tech itself is groundbreaking, through my lens I've sought to capture the powerful human impact as well.

Some of my photos from their community events and workshops have really helped spread awareness of the Collective's role in furthering blockchain accessibility. Sharing images of their educational sessions has inspired more people from diverse backgrounds to get involved.

bio: Research on Cryptotechnology from the Perspective of Ukrainian Law
contributionDescription:
I conduct scientific research on how crypto technologies can enhance contemporary law. I focus specifically on studying this within Ukrainian law, as I am a Ukrainian citizen.

I believe that the values upon which crypto technologies are built, such as transparency, integrity, and legality, are shared with the foundations of modern law. In particular, I see smart contracts as a new agreement form in the contemporary legal landscape.

I believe that if Ukrainian law adopts algorithmic structures, it will gain more trust, as contracts will be executed, and evidence and actions of individuals will be public.
impactDescription: A blockchain-based research article can inspire other scholars to publish on this platform due to its innovative nature and potential to leverage new technology for academic contributions. This can attract more followers of technology and science, fostering a collaborative and forward-thinking academic environment

fundingSources.description: These funds will be allocated for further research purposes
